mapper.insert:
insert into `tb_person`( `id`, `name`, `phone_number`, `job_type`, `input_status`, `certificate_status`, `skill`, `career`, `pay`, `workable_day`, `postcode`, `address`, `detail_address`, `email`, `website`, `education`, `birth_date`, `created_date`, `last_modified_date` ) values
#{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.phoneNumber}, #{item.jobType}, #{item.inputStatus}, #{item.certificateStatus}, #{item.skill}, #{item.career}, #{item.pay}, #{item.workableDay}, #{item.postcode}, #{item.address}, #{item.detailAddress}, #{item.email}, #{item.website}, #{item.education}, #{item.birthDate}, NOW(), NOW()
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `id` = VALUES(`id`), `name` = VALUES(`name`), `phone_number` = VALUES(`phone_number`) , `job_type` = VALUES(`job_type`) , `input_status` = VALUES(`input_status`) , `skill` = VALUES(`skill`) , `career` = VALUES(`career`) , `pay` = VALUES(`pay`) , `workable_day` = VALUES(`workable_day`) , `postcode` = VALUES(`postcode`) , `address` = VALUES(`address`) , `detail_address` = VALUES(`detail_address`) , `email` = VALUES(`email`) , `website` = VALUES(`website`) , `education` = VALUES(`education`) , `birth_date` = VALUES(`birth_date`)

insert into `tb_cmdb_origin`( `UPLOAD_FILE_ORDER` , `FILE_ROW_NUM` , `UPLOAD_DAT` , `ORIGIN_FILE_NM` , `OFFICIAL_WORK_NAME` , `EQUIP_USE_CLASS` , `INSTALL_PLACE` , `SERVER_CLASS` , `USAGE_STATUS` , `EQUIP_DIVISION` , `HOST_NAME` , `PLATFORM` , `OS_NAME` , `OS_VERSION` , `SYSTEM_CLASS` , `INFRA_MANAGER_MAIN` , `INFRA_MANAGER_SUB` , `INTRODUCTION_METHOD` , `OS_BACKUP` , `ASSET_STATUS` , `CREATED_DATE` ) values
#{item.uploadFileOrder}, #{item.fileRowNum}, #{item.uploadDat}, #{item.orginFileNm}, #{item.officialWorkName}, #{item.equipUseClass}, #{item.installPlace}, #{item.serverClass}, #{item.usageStatus}, #{item.equipDivision}, #{item.hostName}, #{item.platform}, #{item.osName}, #{item.osVersion}, #{item.systemClass}, #{item.infraManagerMain}, #{item.infraManagerSub}, #{item.introductionMethod}, #{item.osBackup}, #{item.assetStatus}, NOW()
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `UPLOAD_DAT` = VALUES(`UPLOAD_DAT`), `ORIGIN_FILE_NM` = VALUES(`ORIGIN_FILE_NM`), `OFFICIAL_WORK_NAME` = VALUES(`OFFICIAL_WORK_NAME`) , `EQUIP_USE_CLASS` = VALUES(`EQUIP_USE_CLASS`) , `INSTALL_PLACE` = VALUES(`INSTALL_PLACE`) , `SERVER_CLASS` = VALUES(`SERVER_CLASS`) , `USAGE_STATUS` = VALUES(`USAGE_STATUS`) , `EQUIP_DIVISION` = VALUES(`EQUIP_DIVISION`) , `HOST_NAME` = VALUES(`HOST_NAME`) , `PLATFORM` = VALUES(`PLATFORM`) , `OS_NAME` = VALUES(`OS_NAME`) , `OS_VERSION` = VALUES(`OS_VERSION`) , `SYSTEM_CLASS` = VALUES(`SYSTEM_CLASS`) , `INFRA_MANAGER_MAIN` = VALUES(`INFRA_MANAGER_MAIN`) , `INFRA_MANAGER_SUB` = VALUES(`INFRA_MANAGER_SUB`) , `INTRODUCTION_METHOD` = VALUES(`INTRODUCTION_METHOD`) , `OS_BACKUP` = VALUES(`OS_BACKUP`) , `ASSET_STATUS` = VALUES(`ASSET_STATUS`)

insert into tb_cmdb ( `upload_file_order`, `file_row_num`, `work_division`, `upload_dat`, `origin_file_nm`, `official_work_name`, `equip_use_class`, `install_place`, `server_class`, `usage_status`, `equip_division`, `host_name`, `platform`, `os_name`, `os_version`, `system_class`, `infra_manager_main`, `infra_manager_sub`, `introduction_method`, `os_backup`, `asset_status`, `created_date` ) select b.`upload_file_order`, b.`file_row_num`, ( CASE WHEN c.work_division IS NOT null then c.work_division WHEN b.INSTALL_PLACE = '부평4F' THEN 'cisp' WHEN b.INSTALL_PLACE = '부평5F' THEN 'hidc' WHEN b.INSTALL_PLACE IN ('천안4F', '천안5F') THEN 'dr' END ) AS work_division, b.`upload_dat`, b.`origin_file_nm`, b.`official_work_name`, b.`equip_use_class`, b.`install_place`, b.`server_class`, b.`usage_status`, b.`equip_division`, REGEXP_SUBSTR(b.`host_name` , '^[^.]+') AS host_name, b.`platform`, b.`os_name`, b.`os_version`, b.`system_class`, b.`infra_manager_main`, b.`infra_manager_sub`, b.`introduction_method`, b.`os_backup`, b.`asset_status`, b.`created_date` from tb_cmdb_origin b LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT client_name, work_division FROM tb_policy_client AS c ) AS c ON b.HOST_NAME = c.client_name WHERE upload_file_order = #{uploadFileOrder} AND usage_status in ('운영장비', '임시장비(반입)') AND SYSTEM_CLASS IN ('일반서버', '파티션', '파티션_VM' , 'PC', '어플라이언스') AND PLATFORM NOT IN ('NA' , '') AND INSTALL_PLACE IN ('부평4F', '부평5F' , '천안4F', '천안5F') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `upload_dat` = b.`upload_dat`, `origin_file_nm` = b.`origin_file_nm`, `official_work_name` = b.`official_work_name`, `equip_use_class` = b.`equip_use_class`, `install_place` = b.`install_place`, `server_class` = b.`server_class`, `usage_status` = b.`usage_status`, `equip_division` = b.`equip_division`, `host_name` = b.`host_name`, `platform` = b.`platform`, `os_name` = b.`os_name`, `os_version` = b.`os_version`, `system_class` = b.`system_class`, `infra_manager_main` = b.`infra_manager_main`, `infra_manager_sub` = b.`infra_manager_sub`, `introduction_method` = b.`introduction_method`, `os_backup` = b.`os_backup`, `asset_status` = b.`asset_status`, `created_date` = b.`created_date`
